    • Method Detail

      • createArchangel

        public java.lang.String createArchangel​(java.lang.String name,
                                        java.lang.String prayer,
                                        int day,
                                        int month,
                                        java.lang.String power,
                                        java.lang.String color,
                                        double size,
                                        java.lang.String essence,
                                        double lightDegree)
        Name: createArchangel
        Description: This method creates an object of Angel's type
        Parameters:
        name - receives the name of the angel
        prayer - receives the prayer of the angel
        day - receives the day of the celebration in numbers
        month - receives the month of celebration in numbers
        power - receives the power of the angel
        color - receives the color of the angel's candle
        size - receives the size of the angel's candle in centimeters
        essence - receives the essence of the angel's candle
        lightDegree - receives the light degree of the angel's candle in numbers
        Returns:
        returns a message saying if there is some error or if the angel has been created successfully

      • nameEndsEl

        public boolean nameEndsEl​(java.lang.String name)
        Name: nameEndsEl
        Description: This method checks if the name of the angel ends in "el"
        Parameters:
        name - receives the name of the angel
        Returns:
        returns true if the name ends in el or false if the name does not ends in el

      • validName

        public boolean validName​(java.lang.String name)
        Name: validName
        Description: This method checks if the name of the angel is available and that other angel doesn't have it
        Parameters:
        name - receives the name of the new angel
        Returns:
        returns a boolean, true if the name is not in use and false if the name is already in use

      • validPower

        public boolean validPower​(java.lang.String power)
        Name: validPower
        Description: This method checks if the power of the new angel is available and that there is no other angel that has it
        Parameters:
        power - receives the power of the new angel
        Returns:
        returns a boolean, true if the power is not in use and false if the power is already in use

      • countArchangels

        public int countArchangels()
        Name: countArchangels
        Description: This method counts how many angels has the user created
        Returns:
        gives back the number of existing angels

      • searchByName

        public java.lang.String searchByName​(java.lang.String name)
        Name: searchByName
        Description: This method gives you the information of an existing angel searching his name
        Parameters:
        name - receives the name of the angel that you want to see info
        Returns:
        returns a String with the info of the angel, if the angel is not registered yet, it gives you back a message saying that the angel can't be found

      • searchByPower

        public java.lang.String searchByPower​(java.lang.String power)
        Name: searchByPower
        Description: This method gives you the information of an existing angel searching his power
        Parameters:
        power - receives the power of the angel that you want to see the info
        Returns:
        returns a String with the info of the angel, if the power of the angel is not registered yet, it gives you back a message saying that the angel can't be found

      • searchByMonth

        public java.lang.String searchByMonth​(int month)
        Name: searchByMonth
        Description: This method gives you some information of the existing angels searching by their celebration's month
        Parameters:
        month - receives in numbers the celebration's month of the angels that you want to see info
        Returns:
        returns the angels that have a celebration on that month and some of their information. If the month doesn't have any angel, it gives you back a message saying that the month doesn't have angels

      • showAll

        public java.lang.String showAll()
        Name: showAll
        Description: This method shows you all the created angels with their date of celebration
        Returns:
        returns all the registered angels with their date of celebration. If there is any angel created it gives you back a message saying that there is no angels created

      • validDay

        public boolean validDay​(int day)
        Name: validDay
        Description: This method checks if the day's number is between 1 and 31
        Parameters:
        day - receives the angel's celebration's day
        Returns:
        returns a boolean, true if the day is valid or false if is invalid

      • validMonth

        public boolean validMonth​(int month)
        Name: validMonth
        Description: This method checks if the month's number is between 1 and 12
        Parameters:
        month - receives the angel's celebration's month
        Returns:
        returns a boolean, true if the month is valid or false if is invalid
